channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- POWER METER SICAM Q100
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- POWER METER SICAM Q100

item.title: CVE-2023-30901|2024-01-09T09:59:13.439Z -- siemens -- power%20meter%20sicam%20q100
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in POWER METER SICAM Q100 (All versions < V2.60), POWER METER SICAM Q100 (All versions < V2.60), POWER METER SICAM Q100 (All versions < V2.60), POWER METER SICAM Q100 (All versions < V2.60). The web interface of the affected devices are vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks. By tricking an authenticated victim user to click a malicious link, an attacker could perform arbitrary actions on the device on behalf of the victim user.

item.title: CVE-2023-31238|2024-01-09T09:59:42.265Z -- siemens -- power%20meter%20sicam%20q100
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in POWER METER SICAM Q100 (All versions < V2.60), POWER METER SICAM Q100 (All versions < V2.60), POWER METER SICAM Q100 (All versions < V2.60), POWER METER SICAM Q100 (All versions < V2.60). Affected devices are missing cookie protection flags when using the default settings. An attacker who gains access to a session token can use it to impersonate a legitimate application user.
